/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. On either side of the road, there are buildings and trees, their green foliage contrasting with the urban architecture. The road itself is divided by a median, and a sidewalk runs parallel to it on the right side. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky and the green of the trees standing out against the more muted tones of the buildings. The image does not provide any specific details that could be used to identify the exact location of this street in Beijing.
